data.text:
NPR - Nepalese roepie

The Nepalese roepie is the currency of Nepal. Our currency rankings show that the most popular Nepalese roepie exchange rate is the NPR to USD rate. The currency code for Nepal Rupee is NPR , and the currency symbol is â‚¨. Below, you'll find Nepalese roepie rates and a currency converter.
